Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Loop-bound CTA riders trains are standing near Washington/Wells due to an medical emergency. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound CTA riders trains are standing near Washington/Wells due to an medical emergency.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#12 Roosevelt

#29 State

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between the affected area in both directions.

Green Line:

Clinton/Lake to Roosevelt 

Orange Line:

Adams/Wabash to Roosevelt

Brown Line:

Clark/Lake to Southport

Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Pink Line has been temporarily suspended due to an medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Pink Line has been temporarily suspended due to an medical emergency.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Green Line:

Clinton/Lake to Roosevelt 

Orange Line:

Adams/Wabash to Roosevelt

Brown Line:

Southport to Clark/Lake

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
